name: タウヒード
summary: Year 2031. Main character is 28 year old ex-operative photographer who travels around the world while taking pictures of ruins destroyed by war. A 12-year old girl who joined you in Egypt is being chased by secret organization and even the farthest corners of ruins around the world won't stop them.
info:
• 别名: tawhid
  • 平台: MSX
  • 平台: PC88
  • 平台: PC98
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1989
  • ブランド: チャンピオンソフト
